localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Playlists come and go, but mixtapes are forever. Paste in your playlist URL and it will automatically be added to the paper mixtape template. Download, print, fold, and hand out some nostalgia.
blogPost.body: Playlists come and go, but mixtapes are forever. Paste in your playlist URL and it will automatically be added to the paper mixtape template. Download, print, fold, and hand out some nostalgia.
blogPost.title: Send a Mixtape - Give a digital playlist on a paper crafted cassette
blogPost.author: Tom Henderson

localize.description: 播放列表来来去去，但mixtape是永远的。粘贴你的播放列表URL，它将自动添加到纸质mixtape模板。下载，打印，折叠，并分发一些怀旧。
localize.tagline: 在纸制卡带上赠送一个数字播放列表。

localize.description: 播放列表來來去去，但mixtape是永遠的。粘貼你的播放列表URL，它將自動添加到紙質mixtape模板。下載，打印，摺疊，並分發一些懷舊。
localize.tagline: 在紙製卡帶上贈送一個數字播放列表。

previous.excerpt: Bitclout is a social network built on a blockchain where all users have a creator's coin and where everyone can buy and sell those coins using bitclout crypto-currency
previous.title: BitClout - A crypto social network

localize.description: Bitclout是一个建立在区块链上的社交网络，所有的用户都有一个创客币，每个人都可以使用bitclout加密货币买卖这些硬币
Bitclout是一個建立在區塊鏈上的社交網絡，所有的用戶都有一個創客幣，每個人都可以使用bitclout加密貨幣買賣這些硬幣

next.excerpt: Don't keep your audience waiting for a follow-up email! Sharing slides or resources has never been easier. Upload your content, add your custom QR code to any presentation and streamline sharing. ****Currently free for all early access users****
next.title: Slideshare - Share presentations and resources, easily

localize.description: 不要让你的听众等待后续的电子邮件! 分享幻灯片或资源从未如此简单。上传您的内容，将您的自定义二维码添加到任何演示文稿中，并简化共享。目前所有早期用户均可免费使用****。
localize.tagline: 轻松分享演示文稿和资源

localize.description: 不要讓你的聽衆等待後續的電子郵件! 分享幻燈片或資源從未如此簡單。上傳您的內容，將您的自定義二維碼添加到任何演示文稿中，並簡化共享。目前所有早期用戶均可免費使用****。
localize.tagline: 輕鬆分享演示文稿和資源
